short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Geometry Dash Spam wave series right in your Chrome browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Geometry Dash Spam is a tool to practice and improve your tapping or clicking skills in Geometry Dash.

In some levels you need to tap or click super fast, up to 50 or 100 clicks per second to pass through obstacles. This extension is about wave spamming, where you control a small triangle, the wave, that moves up and down as you tap or click the screen. Your goal is to get the wave through the tight spaces without hitting the edges.

This is a great way to improve your skills and get better at wave spamming in Geometry Dash.

Whether youâ€™re a noob or a pro this extension will help you get better at those hard levels that require fast tapping or clicking.
